docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: At midnight, the teen-ager stood on a Manhattan sidewalk hunched against the cold. He was painfully thin and wore only a grimy jacket, badly fitting pants and plastic beach sandals.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Exercise may enhance an important form of blood cholesterol, but only because it causes people to lose weight, a new study indicates.

headline.main: Health; Exercise Alone May Not Help Cholesterol Level, Study Says

docs.snippet: LEAD: Exercise may enhance an important form of blood cholesterol, but only because it causes people to lose weight, a new study indicates.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: If Dr. Mary S. Calderone had known all about the medications she was taking in 1985, when her troubles began, she might have been spared 30 months of debilitating, often humiliating misery. She suffered from extreme sleepiness, loss of balance, memory problems, weakness, difficulty concentrating, depression, unease and lassitude.
